**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
The following error message:
```
Error: render error in "rook-ceph/templates/deployment.yaml": template: rook-ceph/templates/deployment.yaml:63:27: executing "rook-ceph/templates/deployment.yaml" at <.Values.agent.tolera...>: can't evaluate field toleration in type interface {}
```

**Expected behavior:**
Helm chart installed with the right node toleration for discover.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
```
helm repo add rook-stable https://charts.rook.io/stable
helm install --namespace rook-ceph-system rook-stable/rook-ceph --set discover.toleration=NoSchedule,discover.tolerationKey=dedicated
```

**Environment**:
* OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Debian GNU/Linux 9 (stretch)
* Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 4.9.0-7-amd64
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration: AWS i3.large
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod): 0.9.3
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift): kops
* Storage backend status (e.g. for Ceph use `ceph health` in the [Rook Ceph toolbox](https://rook.io/docs/Rook/master/toolbox.html)): N/A
title: Helm chart binds `DISCOVER_TOLERATION` to `.Values.agent.toleration`
